TopicTitle: Do RemoteTech and kOS Play Nice Together?

Articles.Content: Says it all in the title really. How well do these two mods work together/integrate? I've not been able to find a definite answer one way or the other but searching (forums and Google) seems to suggest that there was, at one point at least, some form of integration between them.

Last I checked (0.25) they worked fairly well together. I think you have to turn on RT features in kOS for them to work together though, which I remember being pretty easy. How they worked together was that you needed a connection to start or stop a script, but kOS could control everything (from the script) even when there wasn't a connection, which is pretty much how you'd expect it to work.
Thanks magico. I'll give them a go then and see how it goes
